# Modern CRM System with AI

## Project Overview
A modern Customer Relationship Management system built with Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and AI capabilities using Groq API.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Groq AI API
- Recharts for analytics
- Zustand for state management

## Features
- Dashboard with analytics
- Customer management
- Lead scoring with AI
- AI chat assistant
- Task management
- Rich UI/UX with modern design

- [x] Project scaffolded
- [x] Dependencies installed
